block.name: Mute
block.doc: Used to mute a signal. Sets the output to 0 when Mute is set to True.

param.name: IO Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input and output streams.

option.name: Complex
option.doc: Sets the input and output streams to complex.

option.name: Float
option.doc: Sets the input and output streams to real.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Sets the input and output streams to 32-bit integer.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Sets the input and output streams to 16-bit integer.

param.name: Mute
param.doc: Specifies whether to mute the input. The 'True' and 'False' options are selectable through the drop-down menu. You can also type the name of a variable in this box.
